title: Black Tights (1-2-3-4 ou Les Collants noirs)

sources.title: BlackTights
sources.description: Maurice Chevalier link together four dramatic ballet Carmen (1949), La croqueuse de diamants (1950), Deuil en 24 heures (1953), and Cyrano de Bergerac (1959) Danced by the Paris Opera Ballet and choreographies by Roland Petit
